trans-unit.source: Specifies a built-in page that can render exception and error information to mobile devices.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
This page is internal and used by the adaptive error handling mechanism to provide error messages that are formatted appropriately for the target device.
trans-unit.target: Diese Seite ist eine interne von Mechanismus zum bieten die Fehlermeldungen, die formatiert werden entsprechend für das Zielgerät für die adaptive Fehlerbehandlung verwendet.

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: für den Betrieb in einer gehosteten Umgebung.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ErrorFormatterPage" /> class.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Returns information about an exception.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.Mobile.MobileErrorInfo" /> object containing information about the error.
trans-unit.target: Ein <see cref="T:System.Web.Mobile.MobileErrorInfo" /> Objekt, das Informationen zum Fehler enthält.

trans-unit.source: This property is used by the adaptive error handling mechanism which provides error messages appropriately formatted for specific target devices.
trans-unit.target: Diese Eigenschaft wird verwendet, durch die adaptive Fehlerbehandlungsmechanismus formatierte Fehlermeldungen für bestimmte Geräte bietet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the content of the error page, based on the error information retrieved.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The base implementation creates the mobile controls necessary to render the error.
trans-unit.target: Die grundlegende Implementierung erstellt die mobile-Steuerelemente erforderlich sind, um den Fehler zu rendern.

trans-unit.source: This property is internal and used by the adaptive error handling mechanism.
trans-unit.target: Diese Eigenschaft ist eine interne von Mechanismus für die adaptive Fehlerbehandlung verwendet.

trans-unit.source: Loads any saved view-state information to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage" /> object.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
An object containing the saved view state.
Internally, this is typically a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> or <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
Called after an object, such as a form or a page, is initialized.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
This method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnInit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to customize the event data for the adapter.
trans-unit.target: Diese Methode überschreibt die <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnInit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> Methode, um die Daten für das Ereignis für den Adapter anzupassen.

trans-unit.source: there is no exception stored in the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" />.
An object in which to store the view-state information.
Saves any view or control state information for the page.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
